bibl.title: Law and Empire in Late Antiquity.
bibl.note: Pour l'Égypte, voir en part. pp. 172-187: 9. Dispute settlement I: Out of court (Arbitration; - Petitions and disputes).

Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 1999, 8°, x-235 pp. ISBN 0-521-41087-8 (hbk) / 0-521-42273-6 (pbk). £47.50 (hbk) / 15.95 (pbk).
